data.Name: Micron Technology Inc
data.Description: Micron Technology, Inc. (MU) is a leading American semiconductor company headquartered in Boise, Idaho, renowned for its innovative memory and storage solutions, specifically dynamic random-access memory (DRAM) and NAND flash memory. The company serves a wide array of industries, including computing, mobile, and automotive, and is well-positioned to capitalize on the growing demand driven by advancements in artificial intelligence, data centers, and the Internet of Things. With a strong commitment to research and development, Micron continues to enhance its competitive edge and maintain its leadership in the memory technology sector on a global scale.
data.Address: 8000 SOUTH FEDERAL WAY, BOISE, ID, UNITED STATES, 83716-9632
